A

AbstractStateHandler - Class in il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.fsm.handler
Parent class for all event handlers.
This class contains the logical methods for all events.
AbstractStateHandler() - Constructor for class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.fsm.handler.AbstractStateHandler
 
ACCOUNT - Static variable in class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.api.API
 
Account - Class in il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.model
The Account holds general information as id and fullName
and balance information: Account balance and reserved amount balance.
Each Charge associated with each operation are saved into a Map with the Charge.getId() as key.
The Account.hashCode() for this class uses the account ID.
Account() - Constructor for class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.model.Account
 
Account(int, String, double) - Constructor for class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.model.Account
 
AccountHelper - Class in il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.bl
A helper class to perform logical actions on Account.
All methods are static.
AccountHelper() - Constructor for class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.bl.AccountHelper
 
AccountStorage - Class in il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.infra
Singletone representing a storage for all data
add(Account) - Method in class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.infra.AccountStorage
 
addCharge(Charge) - Method in class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.model.Account
 
AMOUNT - Static variable in class il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.api.API
 
API - Class in il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.api
